meanings.sent1: The buteos soar high in the sky, searching for prey.
meanings.sent2: Birdwatchers often spot buteos circling above forests.
meanings.sent3: The buteos decided to have a race to see who could fly the fastest.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed was like that of the buteos hunting for food.
meanings.sent5: The majestic buteos with their sharp talons are a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: Buteos: plural form of buteo, a type of bird of prey
meanings.sent1: We saw a group of buteos perched on the branches, waiting patiently.
meanings.sent2: The buteos in the sanctuary were well cared for by the staff.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to imitate the buteos' hunting techniques.
meanings.sent4: The buteos' keen eyesight reminded her of the importance of paying attention to details.
meanings.sent5: The graceful flight of the buteos inspired awe in all who watched.
